root: ^Hello friend, my Grandfather used to climb these mountains but now theyre almost impossible to climb.
^How do you suggest I get to the shrine?
^I found a way to glide across, simply take a big run up, leap and press <color=#F8FF30>E</color>
^You can also press <color=#F8FF30>Q</color> to scale the mountains if you lose your footing, be careful
